tells.data: Will wait 180s after being incensed before attempting to hunt again, instead of the standard 90s

confirmation_tests.data: After smudging the ghost initially, wait 150s - 170s and smudge the ghost again (starting a new smudge timer). If the ghost hunts within 60s of the second smudge (earliest a Demon could hunt), it is a Spirit. Note: this test can fail if the ghost is not actually smudged the second time.

elimination_tests.data: Start a timer as soon as the ghost has been smudged. If the ghost hunts before 180s, it is not a Spirit

tells.data: Will not touch nor interact with salt in any way
Will not be slowed down by tier 3 salt during a hunt

abilities.data: Can teleport to a random player, leaving EMF 2 or EMF 5 at the their new location
Can teleport to a random player, leaving EMF 2 at the their new location
abilities.note: Wraith is the only ghost that can teleport to a player outside of an event

confirmation_tests.data: If you see the ghost walk through a salt pile during an event or hunt without disturbing it, it is a Wraith

Place salt in a line directly below a Tier 1 or Tier 2 motion sensor, ensuring that the salt covers the entirety of the laser line. If the motion sensor activates but the salt is undisturbed, it's a Wraith
If while investigating you get a EMF 2 without any interaction near you, it may have been a Wraith using its ability to teleport

elimination_tests.data: If salt is disturbed by the ghost in any way, it is not a Wraith

tells.data: Will not appear in ghost photos (including DOTs ghost photos)
Taking a photo of the ghost will cause the ghost to disappear (including DOTs state)
Less visible during hunts
Player will lose 0.5% sanity /s while in heartbeat range of the ghost during hunts and events

abilities.data: Can roam toward a random player, leaving EMF 2 at the location where it wanders to

confirmation_tests.data: Take a photo of the ghost during an event or while ghost is visible in DOTs. If the ghost disappears (but the event sounds continue) and the ghost does not appear in the "Ghost" photo in the journal, it is a Phantom
Watch the ghost during a hunt, if the ghost seems nearly invisible during the hunt, it is a Phantom
If while investigating you get a EMF 2 without any interaction near you, it may have been a Phantom using its ability to roam

elimination_tests.data: If the ghost appears in a "Ghost" photo in the journal, it is not a Phantom
If the ghost has normal or increased blinking during a hunt, it is not a Phantom

tells.data: During hunts, Poltergeists will throw an item every 0.5s with an increased force

behaviors.data: Has a higher chance to throw & interact with objects
Can throw objects faster and further

abilities.data: Poltergeist Explosion, will throw multiple objects at the same time, decreasing nearby player sanity by 2% per item thrown

confirmation_tests.data: Place multiple objects in a row on the floor where the ghost is likely to walk over during a hunt. If all items are thrown and at a large distance, it is a Poltergeist
Place multiple objects close together (not on top of each other) in a "pile" in the ghost room. If all or many of the items get thrown at the same time, it is a Poltergeist

tells.data: 33% chance to give unique scream through Parabolic Microphone ðŸ”Š
Hunts based on target's sanity instead of average sanity
Will only pursue its target during a hunt (if the target is inside)
Target loses 15% sanity if they touch the ghost during a singing ghost event (standard drain is 10%)

behaviors.data: Prefers singing ghost events
Will attempt to roam toward their target while in DOTs state
Cannot change favorite rooms

abilities.data: 66% chance to roam toward its target without leaving EMF if target is inside

hunt_sanity.data: Hunts when target's sanity is 50% or lower (even if target is outside), meaning it can hunt as early as 87% (or as late as 12%) average sanity in certain conditions

confirmation_tests.data: Listen to the ghost using a parabolic microphone, if you hear the unique scream, it is a Banshee
In multiplayer, have everyone be inside when the ghost hunts. If the ghost does not pursue non-target players or non-target players are able to touch the ghost without dying, it is a Banshee
Place motion sensors around the map. Use those to determine if the ghost is wandering often toward one of the players. If so, it could be a Banshee

elimination_tests.data: If the ghost changes its favorite room, it is not a Banshee

tells.data: With the breaker on, the Jinn will speed up during a hunt if a player is in LOS and further than 3m away

behaviors.data: The Jinn cannot directly turn off the breaker

abilities.data: With the breaker on, can drop a nearby player's sanity by 25%, with EMF 2 or EMF 5 at the breaker
With the breaker on, can drop nearby players' sanity by 25%, with EMF 2 at the breaker

hunt_speed.data: 2.5m/s when breaker is on, has LOS, and is further than 3m from the seen player, 1.7m/s otherwise

confirmation_tests.data: During a hunt (with the breaker on) stand more than 3m away from the ghost. If the ghost speeds up from 1.7m/s to 2.5m/s when it sees you, and then slows back down once its within 3m of you, it is a Jinn (be aware of active electronics as to not confuse the Raiju speed up)

elimination_tests.data: If the breaker gets turned off directly by the ghost, it is not a Jinn

tells.data: Won't hunt until 40% average sanity when light switch in its current room is in the on position (regardless of breaker state), 60% average sanity if light switch is in the off position or if the lights are broken (regardless of light switch state)

behaviors.data: Will wander out of rooms with lights on to rooms with lights off
Prefers turning off lights and light bursting events
Cannot not turn on lights (excluding TVs and computers)

abilities.data: Can immediately turn off a light switch (or lamp) that a player has turned on within 4m of the ghost

hunt_sanity.data: 60% when lights are off in the ghost's current room, 40% when on

confirmation_tests.data: Every 10s, each player can bait the Mare ability by flicking a light switch or lamp on and seeing if the ghost will immediately turn it off (once per player per lightswitch). If it does, it could be a Mare. To ensure quicker testing, try placing motion sensors below the light switches to know where the ghost is in relation to them. As a note, a Mare cannot use its ability in a room with shattered lights. (Be aware that other ghosts can appear to do this by coincidence, its best to get the ability multiple times)

elimination_tests.data: If a ghost turns on a light switch, it is not a Mare

tells.data: During a hunt, a Revenant will be slow (1.0m/s) until it detects a player (voice, active electronic equipment, or LOS) where it will immediately speed up to 3.0m/s and remain at that speed until it reaches the players last known location where it will gradually slow back down

confirmation_tests.data: During a hunt, listen to the speed of the ghost. If its is slow, but speeds up fast when you allow it to detect you, and then slows down, it is a Revenant. (Will be faster than Jinn and Raiju, see ghost cards for example speeds)

elimination_tests.data: During a hunt, listen to the speed of the ghost. If it is not 1.0m/s or 3.0m/s, it is not a Revenant

tells.data: Only ghost that can appear as a shadow or translucent ghost model on summoning circle event

behaviors.data: Prefers shadow ghost model during events
Will not hunt if in the same room as a player
Will not do events in the same room as a player (but can start an event outside of the room and teleport to the player)

Will not do interactions that result in EMF 2, EMF 3, or EMF 5 while in the same room as the player, including ghost writing and blowing out flames (can step just outside of the room and interact with things in the room)
Will not do interactions that result in EMF 2 or EMF 3 while in the same room as the player, including blowing out flames (can step just outside of the room and interact with things in the room)
Does more ghost events at a lower average sanity (cannot do ghost events at 100% sanity)

hunt_sanity.data: Does not hunt until 35% average sanity

confirmation_tests.data: If you have the summoning circle, light it, and if the ghost is a shadow or translucent model, it it a Shade

Once the ghost room is known, place a crucifix covering the entire room and place motion sensors at all entrances to the room. Pay attention to where the ghost is using the motion sensors. If while the ghost does nothing while in the room (while you are in the room as well), it could be a Shade

elimination_tests.data: If the ghost does any interaction or event resulting in EMF 2, 3, or 4 in the same room as a player, it is not a Shade
If the ghost attempts to hunt or hunts in the same room as a player, it is not a Shade
If the ghost attempts to hunt above 35% average sanity, it is not a Shade
If the ghost does an event while average sanity is at 100%, it is not a Shade

tells.data: Can hunt 60s after being smudged instead of the standard 90s
Can hunt 20s after the previous hunt has ended or ghost has used a crucifix instead of the standard 25s

behaviors.data: Crucifix range is increased by 50% per tier (4.5m, 6m, 7.5m respectively)

hunt_sanity.data: Ability to hunt at any sanity, hunts normally at 70%

confirmation_tests.data: Start a timer after the ghost has been smudged. If it hunts again before 90s, it is a Demon
Start a timer after a hunt ends or after a crucifix has been used. If it hunts again before 25s, it is a Demon

If a ghost hunts above 80% sanity, no one player's sanity is below 50%, and no candles have been lit, it is a Demon (If on Sunny Meadows, it is possible for an Onryo to hunt early since the Chapel candles are already lit)

tells.data: Only ghost that can close or interact with an exit door outside of a hunt/event

behaviors.data: Incensing the ghost will trap the ghost in its room for the duration of the incense effect (90s)

abilities.data: Can shut a door and drop sanity of nearby players by 15% if a door is in the room

elimination_tests.data: Place motion sensors (or salt) in the entrances to the room and smudge the ghost. If the ghost leaves the room before 90s, it is not a Yurei

tells.data: Drains 20% sanity during events (instead of the standard 10%)
Will not do "Ghost Mist" event
Blinks more frequently during hunts, making them more visible

behaviors.data: More active around multiple people
More likely to appear as full ghost model during events

confirmation_tests.data: Watch the ghost during a hunt, if the ghost is more visible during the hunt, it is a Oni
If sanity monitor is enabled, check sanity after a ghost event. If it dropped 20% instead of 10%, it is an Oni

elimination_tests.data: If you ever get a "Ghost Mist" event, it is not an Oni

tells.data: Hearing/detection distance is 2.5m and less during hunts

behaviors.data: More active when talking near it

abilities.data: Talking in the same room as a Yokai can cause it to hunt up to 80% average sanity

hunt_sanity.data: Can hunt up to 80% sanity when talking in the same room as it, hunts normally at 50%

confirmation_tests.data: During a hunt, speak (or key up global chat) while at a distance where a normal ghost could hear you but a Yokai could not and see if the ghost comes to you. If it doesn't detect you, it is a Yokai

elimination_tests.data: During a hunt, speak (or key up global chat) while at a distance where a normal ghost could hear you but a Yokai could not and see if the ghost comes to you. If it does detect you, it is not a Yokai

tells.data: Will have visible freezing breath during hunts when the breaker is off/broken
Cannot turn on the breaker
More likely to turn off the breaker
Is faster in colder rooms during hunts

evidence.data: Guaranteed freezing on Nightmare / Insanity mode

confirmation_tests.data: Ensure the breaker is off/broken, then watch the ghost while it hunts. If you see visible breath from the ghost, it is a Hantu
During a hunt if the ghost seems to change speeds randomly without being influenced by equipment or the player, it is a Hantu

elimination_tests.data: While the breaker is off or broken, if you do not see visible breath, it is not a Hantu
If the ghost turns on the breaker, it is not a Hantu
If the ghost speeds up in LOS, it is not a Hantu

tells.data: DOTs only appear on video camera and will not show if a player is in the same room (DOTs state can start outside of room and enter a player's room)

behaviors.data: Cannot change favorite rooms
Does not wander from its room often

evidence.data: Guaranteed DOTs on Nightmare / Insanity mode

elimination_tests.data: If the ghost changes its favorite room, it is not a Goryo

tells.data: Footsteps and vocals cannot be heard more than 12m away during hunts (normal is 20m)
Has an increased number of sounds through the parabolic microphone

confirmation_tests.data: During a hunt, if you cannot hear the ghost between 12m and 20m away, it is a Myling

elimination_tests.data: If you can hear the ghost between 12m and 20m away during a hunt, it is not a Myling

tells.data: Will attempt to hunt at any sanity after extinguishing every 3rd flame

behaviors.data: Flames act like crucifixes, will blow out a flame if it tries to hunt (within 4m). Ghost prioritizes flames over crucifixes when preventing hunts
More likely to extinguish a flame, the more players that are dead

hunt_sanity.data: Can hunt at any sanity using its ability, hunts normally at 60%

confirmation_tests.data: If sanity is above 75%: Place a candle on top of a Tier 1 or Tier 2 crucifix. If after the candle has been extinguished 3 times the crucifix is used, it could be an Onryo

If sanity is below 35%: Place a candle or many candles in the ghost room and keep them constantly lit. If the ghost has not hunted or used a crucifix after an extended period of time, it could be an Onryo

elimination_tests.data: Place a candle on top of a crucifix (be aware that the range of the Tier 3 crucifix has a larger range than the candle does for preventing an Onryo hunt, you may need multiple candles to get coverage). If the crucifix is used while the candle is still lit, it is not an Onryo

tells.data: Can do 2 interactions at the same time, one within its standard range (1.5m, 3m on medium/large maps) and the other within its extended range (8m, 16m on medium/large maps)
Ghost speed during hunts will be  Â±10% of the normal 1.7m/s speed

behaviors.data: Triggering motion sensors, stepping in salt, and spirit box responses only occur at its physical location

hunt_speed.data: 1.53m/s when hunting from its standard range, 1.87m/s when hunting from its extended range

confirmation_tests.data: If the ghost alternates between +10% speed and -10% speed between hunts, it is The Twins
If there are interactions far away from the ghost room frequently, it could be The Twins

tells.data: During a hunt, causes electronic disturbance at a 15m range instead of 10m
Increased speed near active electronic equipment while hunting
Can hunt at 65% when near active electronic equipment

hunt_sanity.data: Can hunt at 65% sanity near active player equipment

confirmation_tests.data: Place active electronics near the ghost room. Then, during a hunt, hide and listen for the ghost to walk near the electronics. If the ghost is fast while walking near them, but slows down further away from them, it is a Raiju

While the ghost is hunting and is nearby, turn on and off a piece of electronic equipment (held or on the ground, you won't give your position away if its on the ground). If the ghost's speed increases and decreases in relation to the equipment, it is a Raiju
If the ghost hunts early between 50% - 65%, it could be a Raiju

elimination_tests.data: If the ghost does not speed up near electronics during a hunt, it is not a Raiju

tells.data: Special 6 fingered fingerprints (Open 'Guides' tab)
Has a 25% chance to not leave ultraviolet evidence
Will change models for a single blink during hunts at least once per standard length hunt (See deeper explanation)

abilities.data: Can make fingerprints disappear twice as fast

evidence.data: Guaranteed ultraviolet on Nightmare / Insanity mode

confirmation_tests.data: Find a location where you can loop the ghost while being able to see the model at all times. If while looping the ghost during a hunt you see the model change for a single blink, it is an Obake

tells.data: Will always show Ghost Orbs as an additional evidence, even on 0 evidence

abilities.data: Changes ghost behavior every 30 seconds to 2 minutes, leading to inconsistent behavior depending on the ghost is it currently mimicking

hunt_sanity.data: Copies behavior of currently mimicked ghost

hunt_speed.data: Copies speed of currently mimicked ghost

confirmation_tests.data: In 0 evidence, check the ghost's favorite room for Ghost Orbs. If there are Ghost Orbs, it is The Mimic
Pay attention to the ghost behavior each hunt. If the behavior changes wildly between hunts (it appears to be a different ghost each time), it is The Mimic

elimination_tests.data: Check the ghost's favorite room for Ghost Orbs. If there are no Ghost Orbs, it is not The Mimic

tells.data: Places a curse on player when heard through spirit box or parabolic microphone, which causes sanity to passively drain twice as fast
Places a curse on player when heard through parabolic microphone, curse drops sanity 2x as fast
Incense blindness duration during hunts is increased by 50% (7.5s instead of 5s)

behaviors.data: Faster when average sanity is lower, can reach a speed of 3.71 m/s when in LOS

hunt_speed.data: Faster when average sanity is lower, can reach a speed of 3.71 m/s when in LOS

evidence.data: Guaranteed spirit box on Nightmare / Insanity mode

confirmation_tests.data: If you observe an increase in speed between hunts with LOS speed up, it is a Moroi
After smudging a ghost during hunt, if it takes more than 5s to return to you (assuming it can still detect you), it is a Moroi
If after hearing a whisper on the parabolic microphone you are unable to stop passive sanity drain by standing in a (small) lit room, it is a Moroi
Once your average sanity is below 40%, take sanity medication during a hunt. If the ghost's speed decreases afterward, it is a Moroi
If after hearing a whisper on the parabolic microphone a player's sanity seems to decrease more quickly, it could be a Moroi

tells.data: 33% chance to give heavy breathing through spirit box when within 1m of the ghost ðŸ”Š
Very fast hunt speed, but will slow down as it nears the targetted player
Is more visible during hunts

behaviors.data: Always has LOS of the player during hunts, meaning you cannot hide from a Deogen

hunt_sanity.data: Does not hunt until 40% average sanity

hunt_speed.data: 3.0m/s when far away, drops to 0.4m/s when close to the player

evidence.data: Guaranteed spirit box on Nightmare / Insanity mode

confirmation_tests.data: If during a hunt you hear the ghost speeding toward you but then slow down significantly when near you, its a Deogen

elimination_tests.data: If the ghost attempts to hunt above 40% average sanity, it is not a Deogen

tells.data: Age response on Ouija board increases as Thaye ages

behaviors.data: Ghost ages over time (every 1-2 minutes) while player is nearby
More active when younger

hunt_sanity.data: Hunts at 75% at its youngest, 15% at its oldest

hunt_speed.data: 2.75m/s at its youngest, 1.0m/s at its oldest

confirmation_tests.data: If you have a Ouija Board, ask for the ghost's age. After some time, ask the question again. If the number given increases, it is a Thaye
If the speed decreases each hunt and the ghost has no LOS, it is a Thaye
During a hunt, if the ghost does not speed up in LOS, it could be a Thaye

elimination_tests.data: During a hunt, if a ghost does speed up with LOS, it is not a Thaye
